EmailTemplate.name: FY20_Cold_Nurture.FY20_Cold_Nurture_Email_2_Hiscox
EmailTemplate.subject: Hiscox Drives Growth & Innovation with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Hiscox is a 100-year-old business insurance company that is rapidly expanding across the globe. Turbonomic has helped them optimize their Azure spend while assuring application performance and maintaining policy compliance.
Watch the below video to learn more about how Turbonomic has helped Hiscox's IT organization drive operational excellence, providing a platform and foundation that enables innovation across the business.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/videos/hiscox-leveraging-performance-with-turbonomic]]> "That's where Turbonomic's platform comes in for us: getting us to that point of equilibrium where we make sure that we're spending the shareholders' money appropriately to drive our business, that we're giving the customer great performance while also ensuring that we can continue to remain compliant and we couldn't have done that without Turbonomic." - Ian Penny CIO of Hiscox
Learn more <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/]]> about how we can help you assure performance while minimizing cost and ensuring compliance by visiting our Customers <[[https://turbonomic.com/customers/]]> page.
Best, Elizabeth
